title: Firecrawl GitHub Organization Profile - Shows Both MCP Server and CLI Available
author: Firecrawl / mendableai
key_insight: Firecrawl explicitly maintains BOTH a Model Context Protocol server (firecrawl-mcp-server) AND a CLI-based agent skill (firecrawl-cli / firecrawl-claude-plugin). The org profile lists them as separate products side-by-side. This confirms the choice to use CLI for the official Claude Code marketplace plugin was deliberate, not due to lack of MCP capability. Firecrawl had both options and chose CLI for the Anthropic marketplace.

products_listed.name: firecrawl (main repo)
products_listed.description: Core API and SDK, 40k+ GitHub stars

products_listed.name: firecrawl-mcp-server
products_listed.description: Model Context Protocol Server for LLM integration (Claude, Cursor)

products_listed.name: firecrawl-cli / agent skill
products_listed.description: CLI tool and agent skill, installable via npx skills add firecrawl/cli

extraction_method: WebFetch from GitHub blob and raw URL
